item.title: Discover more about Malaysia's demographics by reading a book on the population of Malaysia
item.description:
Source: ISEAS website. The second edition of The Population of Malaysia, authored by Saw Swee-Hock, former Professor of Statistics at the National University of Singapore and Chairman of the National Statistical Commission of Singapore from 1971 to 1975, has been released. This updated analysis of Malaysia’s diverse population offers valuable insights for businesses interested in the Malaysian market. Dr. Saw leverages his extensive knowledge of the country, gained through his upbringing, teaching experience at the University of Malaya, and involvement in population census planning, to provide unique perspectives...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/discover-more-about-malaysia-s-demographics-by-reading-a-book-on-the-population-of-malaysia/
